title: Cook
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Captain>>
<<portrait|captain_laughing>>
Evening, Cook.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Chef>>
<<portrait|cook_laughing>>
Evening, Cap.
<</Textbox>>

<<set $list to array("first", "second", "third")>>
<<set $textToLog to "Have anything to contribute to the investigation?">>
<<AddEntry TestimonyManager $textToLog cook_neutral>>
<<set $obama to "Oh look, Obama!">>
[[/$obama|Cook.Ask]]

<<if visited("Medic.Residue")>>
    [[Just spoke to the medic recently about that residue.|Cook.Residue]]
<<endif>>

title: Cook.Residue
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
Really? What'd you find?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Captain>>
<<portrait|captain_neutral>>
Apparently, it's a species thing. According to the medic, the first mate is able to produce it, but only under extreme duress.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
Huh.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
I don't know, Cap. That doesn't sound right to me.
<</Textbox>>

[[What do you mean?|Cook.Elaborate]]
[[You think you got a better suggestion?|Cook.Suspicious]]

title: Cook.Ask
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
Unfortunately, no. I was stuck in the mess putting out the fire when the murder 
happened.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
Afraid there's not much I can contribute.
<</Textbox>>

title: Cook.Suspicious
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_angry>>
What does that mean?
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Captain>>
<<portrait|captain_angry>>
I mean, you would rather be giving me contradictions than actual eveidence I could use. I can imagine that residue is actually one of those sauces you keep with you.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_angry>>
Listen. I've got bigger messes to clean than yours. Go figure out your little mystery by yourself.
<</Textbox>>

title: Cook.Elaborate
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
There's a lot more reason for the first mate to be nervous than just the murder. Last port we left before this whole business went down, he got a message from his partner saying they was coming down with something bad.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
I think the murder might be exarcerbating things a bit.
<</Textbox>>

[[Possibly. Maybe he was close to a breakdown and did something he shouldn't?|Cook.Engineer]]
[[You think you got a better suggestion?|Cook.Suspicious]]

title: Cook.Engineer
body:
<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
Honestly, Cap? He just doesn't seem like that kind of person. I mean, I might be wrong, but it would be a hell of a shock to me.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
You know what you should do? Talk to the Engineer. She said she was in the bridge when it happened, but I can definitely remember hearing her voice down the corridor from me at the time.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
<<name|Cook>>
<<portrait|cook_neutral>>
She might have been talking through an emergency feed, but you never know.
<</Textbox>>

<<Textbox>>
("Engineer's Alibi" Key Dialogue Unlocked)
<</Textbox>>
